ai-mil3.7.9:1.2_0: “Venerable sir, there is something that you’re different in a Brahmā realm, or anyone else whose body is far from the Brahmā realm.”
ai-mil3.7.9:1.3_0: “Great king, there is someone whose body made by way of body, speech, or mind who would go to the Brahmā realm or anyone elsewhere.”
ai-mil3.7.9:2.1_0: “Sir, how does a royal bull elephant go to the north of the body so as to cross the Brahmā realm?”
ai-mil3.7.9:2.2_0: “Great king, do you know this earth or that treasure’s wealth?”
ai-mil3.7.9:2.3_0: “Sir, I recall getting them to do with the eight treasures.”
ai-mil3.7.9:2.4_0: “Great king, how do you get the eight treasures?”
ai-mil3.7.9:2.5_0: “Sir, I shall give rise to the thought, ‘I’ll shake off my body with my mind.’
ai-mil3.7.9:2.6_0: “In the same way, a mendicant with psychic powers who has achieved mastery of their mind, and attains mastery of the mind.”
